title: Agbe
author: Agbe
content: A terrorist sect in Nigeria called Boko Haram said, they are planning to kidnap some of the key Political leaders in the Country. And if that really happened then Nigeria is a fall state. Now the question arising from different television and radio stations is that, can the terrorist group kidnap the president?https://news-af.feednews.com/news/detail/4acc31e288f3eda1c676c1d36e03288b?client=newsThis terrorist group has kidnapped a lot of the people in the country and killed a lot of people and burned down communities in the Northern part of the country. They are using different ways or approaches to destroy life and properties. They are part of the increase inflation in the country. So what do you think is the best option to eliminate this deadly terrorist group in Africa. This terrorist group are Muslims. So what is your opinion to end terrorist in Africa? As for me any terrorist that has been arrested should be send to  Guantanamo Bay detention camp  in Cuba or  Abu Ghraib prison if the later is still existing the it is preferable.

comments.author: Masplanc
comments.body: If terrorists that are terrorising a country succeed in kidnapping the country's president that is to say that the country has failed, terrorist are in charge of the country for them to have a president in their custody.  It so sad for government to be struggling with terrorist for years without doing anything by terminating this terrorist group.  I believe no terrorist is bigger or stronger than a government except the government agrees to dance to their tone.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: If the leaders of a country can't set themselves up with protections from terrorists, they shouldn't be in a position of leadership. However, double check into who is behind the terrorists. It's probably the CIA.

comments.author: Coyster
comments.body: The high rate of terrorism, banditry, kidnapping and in general insecurity in Nigeria is frightening, but rather 'unfortunately' it wouldn't culminate in the president being kidnapped, these elite men have managed to sufficiently protect themselves, but sadly what is going to happen is that more innocent citizens will fall victim to this terrorists and the government doesn't seem to care. 2023 is going to be a pivotal one, i hope Nigerians can use their PVC's to elect a leader that will represent them better.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: It would be a good news to hear that the President of Nigeria has been kidnapped by terrorists. This is because the government of that nation have not been able to tackle insecurity even averagely. Everyday we hear news of people being kidnapped and killed and the government is doing nothing about it. Maybe the kidnap of the President would be a wake-up call to the Vice-President to rejig the security architecture of the nation and make it more proactive. For now, the security of Nigeria is in shambles.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: If Nigeria President has been threaten to be kidnapped, maybe he is not performing his duties properly because, I have heard so many times on radio about the insecurity and insurgency in Nigeria. Bandits adopting and killing people in different states are areas of the country.  I have also heard there is a high rate of corruption in Nigeria and how political leaders turns election into a do or die affair, not considering the masses that voted them into power after elections   All these are problems that can result ireopen.reatening the government and economy instability. The president should be able to calm and address all these problems as the first citizen of the country.    His failure of doing all these has made some persons to look into kidnapping him  for a change of government because these terrorist  are sponsored by some persons.    Nigeria is facing a lot of challenge especially now that elections are coming up next year,universities are on strike and today National Labour Congress has also embark on a two days strike to make sure the universities reopen

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: As of yesterday the so called terrorist group ambushed the presidential guide convoy and killed 3 person from the attacked. At first I thought the terrorist group was just using that to threaten the president but from the attacked of the special guide to the president, I come to believe that the terrorist group is even more serious than ever. As it is. Everyone in the country sleep with one eye open, mostly at the Northern part of the country and their target are the Christians. Upon seen all these things like this and the NATIONAL GOVERNMENT could not do anything to stop the so called Boko Haram. Something is wrong at somewhere in Nigeria. Nigeria youths should wake up wake. Make sure you go out vote to remove the Muslim Muslim ticket and Atiku from PDP. APC and PDP are the problem we have in the country. Although, not the part but the candidates. Nigeria is a Fall State.Peter Obi is the answer

comments.author: TheNineClub
comments.body: Boko Haram are a big and long lasting terrorist group so it's maybe best to look how other countrys have delt with that. In particular, ETA in Spain and IRA in Ireland have never been cracked down or shut down by the governments, rather they gradually watered down their approach and decided to take their causes in a mire political arena with IRA becoming a political party and members of ETA deciding to take political means towards independance. There are also some same examples in some Sounth American countrys. That being said, this is a religious movement first (I could be wrong), so maybe there will have to be a different approach. But a government crack down will probably not be efficiant.

comments.author: Franctoshi
comments.body: That is to show the level of insecurity in the country as we speak under the leadership of the current president General Muhammad Buhari , Nigeria is just like a sheep without shepherd. He will only be traveling from one county to another without having to tackle the high insecurity problem facing the country and in the process Joeperdising with the lives of innocent Nigeria and this is a total mess. The 2023 come general election should be taken seriously by all citizens of the country and ensure they vote wisely because if they happens to get it wrong this time, then it means more suffering and problem for the entire citizens of Nigerian.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: I hear claims like this and I laugh. It's amusing as to how these guys come up with the notion that they could lunch a kidnap attempt on the president of a country, any country and succeed. I think it's something we should reserve for the movies.Not to mention the inexperienced and not properly coordinated Nigerian Boko Haram that believes in brute force. They've only managed to persist so far because the Nigerian government have allowed them to operate without any trouble. Why? They are serving a purpose for them politicians but I think they would run out of that freedom should they kidnap an on seat president.The fool force of the federal power would be on them, they would be investigated and found out. Not even one of them or there families would be left free to roam the streets.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: I watch a documentary that happened long ago in some part of Africa where they successfully get to where the president is and killed him, If I'm not mistaken the country was Liberia, where corruption is widely spread, you can see it by watching the state of the people there. You can watch it on youtube to see how they cornered the president and ended his life. They really need to fix their country with everything they got, because when corruption will be eliminated, these so-called terrorists will also cease to exist, the example that is those countries that are successful for example Singapore, Japan, and South Korea.

comments.author: Tellarmachine
comments.body: Terrorism in Nigeria as it is to the rest of the countries of the world is a growing concern. This is not so because terrorists in Nigeria have threatened to kidnap the country's president. But because terrorism is a maniac that has to be eradicated with all hands on deck. And by every possible mean. So to speak.But, sad to say, there are people, I mean, prominent personalities of the world and well-meaning religionists of every sort who are being fingered as not only sponsors of terrorism but preachers of it also as in the form of tribalism, religionism, racism and so forth.Hence, to fight terrorism is to combat tribalism, religionism, racism, drugry and partially.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Well the truth have to be told, what do you expect from a country where a president is not capable of leading his country?Out of +200m population, each year less than 1 percent or even more graduates from school every year. Only 0.03 percent gain job and 0.09 percent are self employed while 0.02 percent are desperately seeking for abroad visa to go away from the country due to hardship. Note: This rating is not in total of +200m population, is just a 1 percent of school graduates.Both the old and Young are facing the same problem, the Rich and Poor facing same issues in the country, way of living became so hard and tough, rough. At this point it increases the rate of Kidnapping, Kill for ritual, community vandalization, pipeline vandalization, highway robbery ect in the country. Yet the so called government kept borrowing from other countries like China for self gain, looting of money, borrowing in the name fixing the country and yet nothing to show up, every year by year same borrowing of money and no results, inflation rate very high. Very hard to survive. If you checked in the market, market women are crying everyday by day no one to buy due to high price of food stuffs. Since no buyer they end up coming back home with it and go back the next day, same problems.Summary.Employment is the only key factor to fix Nigerian problems, in a way they raised people from hardship then you reduce rubbery, killing and pipeline vandalization.
